column3: Kasa kyerɛ Aaron ne mbabanyin asɔfo no
column5: Mma hɔn mu biara nngu noho fi wɔ fun ho wɔ ne man mu;"

column2: "nye n’akyerɛbaa a ɔyɛ ɔbaabun a ɔbɛn no a onnyae nnyaa okun no
column3: ɔno ho na ɔmma noho nngu fi."

column2: "Mma onngu noho fi wɔ ne nyimpa tsitsir a ɔyɛ wɔ no nkorɔfo mu ntsi

column3: nkyii so mma wonnyi hɔn abɔdwesa ano
column4: na wɔmmbobɔ hɔn honam mu akam so."

column3: na mma wonnhura hɔn Nyankopɔn ne dzin ho: na EWURADZE gya afɔr no
column5: hɔn na wɔdze ba: dɛm ntsi wɔnyɛ krɔnkrɔn."

column3: anaa no ho egu fi nnwar no; nkyii so mma wɔmmfa ɔbaa a no kun ako no no nnwar no: na ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn ma ne Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi tsew no ho; na ɔno na ɔdze wo Nyankopɔn edziban ba: ɔnyɛ krɔnkrɔn mma wo: na emi EWURADZE a metsew hom ho no

column3: dze ehuhubra gu noho fi a
column4: oegu n’egya no ho fi: wɔmfa gya nhyew no."

column2: "Na nyia ɔyɛ no nuanom mu ɔsɔfopanyin a woehue ɔserango egu n’etsifi
column3: na woetu no esi nkyɛn dɛ ɔnhyɛ ntar no
na onngu noho fi mma n’egya
na onnhura ne Nyankopɔn ahotseweebea ho; na ne Nyankopɔn ɔserango abɔtsir no wɔ n’etsifi: emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Na ɔnodze ɔbaabun na ɔmfa no nwar no."

column4: anaa ɔbaa a no ho egu fi
column6: iyinom dze mma ɔnnwar hɔn mu biara: mbom nankasa ne man mu ɔbaabun na ɔmfa no nwar no."

column2: "Na mma onnhura n’asefo ho wɔ ne man mu: na emi nye EWURADZE a metsew no ho."

column5: Obiara a ofi w’asefo mu wɔ w’ebusuasantsen nyinara mu a odzi dzɛm no mma ɔmmbɛn mmbɛfa ne Nyankopɔn edziban mmba."

column2: "Na nyimpa biara a odzi dzɛm no
column6: nyia no honam ho adze bi bor do o

column2: "ɔsɔfo Aaron n’asefo mu nyimpa biara a odzi dzɛm no mma ɔnntwe mmbɛn mmbɛfa EWURADZE ogya afɔr no mmba: odzi dzɛm; eso mma ɔnntwe mmbɛn mmbɛfa ne Nyankopɔn edziban no mmba."
"Ntwamutam no mu nkotoo na mma ɔnnkɔ
column3: na ɔmma ɔnntwe mmbɛn afɔrmbukyia no so
column4: osiandɛ odzi dzɛm; amma oeenngu me mbeambea krɔnkrɔn no ho fi: na emi nye EWURADZE a metsew hɔn ho no."
